body_html:
There's the tf.py_func op which lets you insert Python functions into the computational graph: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/api_docs/python/script_ops.html
Is this close to what you had in mind?
body_text:
There's the tf.py_func op which lets you insert Python functions into the computational graph: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/api_docs/python/script_ops.html
Is this close to what you had in mind?
body:
There's the `tf.py_func` op which lets you insert Python functions into the computational graph: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.9/api_docs/python/script_ops.html
Is this close to what you had in mind?
